name: scheduleBuffer(_:at:options:completionHandler:)
desc: Schedules the playing samples from an audio buffer at the time and playback options you specify.
declaration:
func scheduleBuffer(_ buffer: AVAudioPCMBuffer, 
                 at when: AVAudioTime?, 
            options: AVAudioPlayerNodeBufferOptions = [], 
  completionHandler: AVAudioNodeCompletionHandler? = nil)
